org.dotplot.core.services
Interface IErrorHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultErrorHandler
public interface IErrorHandler

Handler for error which can occure in the service framework.

Author:
Christian Gerhardt

Method Detail

error

void error(ITaskPart t,
           java.lang.Exception e)
Handles an error.

A error is usualy unexpected and interupts the program, which need further processing, if it should resume its work or not.

Parameters:
t - The source of the error.
e - The Exception which caused the error.

fatal

void fatal(ITaskPart t,
           java.lang.Exception e)
Handles a fatal error.

A fatal error is usualy unrecoverable an interupts the program immediately.

Parameters:
t - The source of the fatal error.
e - The Exception which caused the error.

warning

void warning(ITaskPart t,
             java.lang.Exception e)
Handles a warning.

A warning is usualy no problem for the programm, but a note for the user.

Parameters:
t - The source of the warning.
e - The Exception which caused the error.
